resources.string: "Choose 'ARCADE' to play infinite games in a random play mode. 'CHALLENGE' mode allows levels based progressive mode of play. Solve all 5 games in a level to unlock the next one."
"Solve each puzzle by untangling the rays. Red ray indicates tangled state. Touch and drag an orb to move it to desired location. A selected orb is displayed with a white glow around it."

"Moves and Time are indicated on top left and right respectively. Try and beat your personal best by solving the puzzle in fewer moves taking lesser time. Bonus game is unlocked every 5 completed games."
Expandable Menu provides various in-game options including quitting the game, viewing the solution and turning the soundtrack on/off.
"View game levels and their status along with statistics for any selected game. Paid levels are indicated by a red lock. Click 'Purchase' button to buy these additional levels for challenge mode."
"View game levels and their status along with statistics for any selected game. Paid levels are indicated by a red lock."

"Get access to game stats and online leader boards via the 'SCORES' option on Home Screen or in-game menu. Touch the 'CHANGE' button to filter the leader board criteria between different Modes, Durations and Zones."
"in a row Press Up to Play"
